document.full_text: a somali man accused of negotiating a ransom after pirates seized a merchant ship in the gulf of aden has been brought to the united states to face criminal charges, the justice department said thursday.
document.title: accused somali pirate negotiator faces u.s. charges
lines_and_colors: a somali man accused of negotiating a ransom after pirates seized a merchant ship in the gulf of aden has been brought to the united states to face criminal charges, the justice department said thursday.
